titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Griffiths Eye and Hand Co-ordination Scale Score - Description

div.p: The Griffiths Eye and Hand Co-ordination Scale Score is a PERSON SCORE.
The Griffiths Eye and Hand Co-ordination Scale Score is sub-scale D of the Griffiths Mental Development Scales, and covers fine motor skills, manual dexterity and visual monitoring skills.
